generic <typename T> public ref class ArrayPool abstract

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 在资源池中的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the objects that are in the resource pool.

summary.span: 提供可重复使用 类型实例的资源池。

span.span: Provides a resource pool that enables reusing instances of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用租用，并返回缓冲区的类 (使用和方法) 可以提高性能，在其中创建和销毁经常阵列的情况下，从而导致垃圾回收的大量内存压力收集器。Using the class to rent and return buffers (using the and methods) can improve performance in situations where arrays are created and destroyed frequently, resulting in significant memory pressure on the garbage collector.

span.span: This class is thread-safe.

threadsafe.span: 所有成员可由多个线程同时都使用。

span.span: All members may be used by multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此构造函数受保护时仅可由派生的类调用类。Note that this constructor is protected; it can only be called by classes derived from the class.

param.name: maxArrayLength
param.span: 可能存储在池中的数组实例的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of an array instance that may be stored in the pool.

param.name: maxArraysPerBucket
param.span: 可能存储在池中每个存储桶的数组实例的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum number of array instances that may be stored in each bucket in the pool.

param.span: 该池将长度类似的数组分到不同的存储桶，以更快进行访问。

span.span: The pool groups arrays of similar lengths into buckets for faster access.

summary.span: 使用指定的配置创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class using the specifed configuration.

returns.span: 使用指定配置的 类的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the class with the specified configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类创建的此方法将分组到存储桶中，不带数组超过`maxArraysPerBucket`在每个存储桶，并与这些阵列不超过`maxArrayLength`的长度。The instance of the class created by this method will group arrays into buckets, with no more than `maxArraysPerBucket` in each bucket, and with those arrays not exceeding `maxArrayLength` in length.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract T[] Rent (int minimumLength);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !T[] Rent(int32 minimumLength) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Rent (minimumLength As Integer) As T()
public: abstract cli::array <T> ^ Rent(int minimumLength);
abstract member Rent : int -> 'T[]

span.span: The minimum length of the array.

summary.span: 检索至少为请求的长度的缓冲区。

span.span: Retrieves a buffer that is at least the requested length.

returns.span: 类型的数组，该数组长度至少为 。

span.span: An array of type that is at least in length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此缓冲区借给调用方，不应返回到相同的池使用方法，因此它可以在后续调用中重复使用方法。This buffer is loaned to the caller and should be returned to the same pool using the method, so that it can be reused in subsequent calls to the method. 未能返回租赁的缓冲区不是严重错误。Failure to return a rented buffer is not a fatal error. 但是，它可能会导致降低应用程序性能，因为池可能需要创建新的缓冲区来替换丢失。However, it may lead to decreased application performance, as the pool may need to create a new buffer to replace the lost one.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Return (T[] array, bool clearArray = false);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Return(!T[] array, bool clearArray) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Return (array As T(), Optional clearArray As Boolean = false)
abstract member Return : 'T[] * bool -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要返回给先前使用 方法获得的池的缓冲区。

span.span: A buffer to return to the pool that was previously obtained using the method.

param.name: clearArray
param.span: 指示是否应在重复使用前清除缓冲区的内容。

span.span: Indicates whether the contents of the buffer should be cleared before reuse.

param.span: 如果 设置为 ，并且该池将存储缓冲区，供后续重复使用， 方法将清除其内容的 ，这样，使用 方法的后续调用方便不会看到先前调用方的内容。

span.span: If is set to , and if the pool will store the buffer to enable subsequent reuse, the method will clear the of its contents so that a subsequent caller using the method will not see the content of the previous caller.

param.span: 如果 设置为 ，或者该池将释放缓冲区，则数组内容保持不变。

span.span: If is set to or if the pool will release the buffer, the array's contents are left unchanged.

summary.span: 要返回给先前在同一 实例上使用 方法获得的池的缓冲区。

span.span: Returns an array to the pool that was previously obtained using the method on the same instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后一个缓冲区返回到池后，调用方放弃所有缓冲区的所有权，并且不能使用它。Once a buffer has been returned to the pool, the caller gives up all ownership of the buffer and must not use it. 从给定调用返回的引用才必须使用返回方法方法一次。The reference returned from a given call to the method must only be returned using the method once. 默认值可能存放到返回的缓冲区上以租用试，或它可能会发布返回的缓冲区，如果确定该池已经有足够的缓冲区存储。The default may hold onto the returned buffer in order to rent it again, or it may release the returned buffer if it's determined that the pool already has enough buffers stored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Buffers.ArrayPool<T> Shared { get; }
.property class System.Buffers.ArrayPool`1<!T> Shared
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Shared As ArrayPool(Of T)
public: static property System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ Shared { System::Buffers::ArrayPool<T> ^ get(); };
member this.Shared : System.Buffers.ArrayPool<'T>

span.span: Gets a shared instance.
A shared instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享的池提供的默认实现适用于常规的适用性的类。The shared pool provides a default implementation of the class that's intended for general applicability. 共享的类维护多个大小的数组，并可能会退回更大的数组不是实际请求，但它将永远不会退回少于请求的较小数组。A shared class maintains arrays of multiple sizes, and may hand back a larger array than was actually requested, but it will never hand back a smaller array than was requested. 租用从共享的类使用的缓冲区方法将导致正在从相应池中获取，如果可用的适当的缓冲区，或在新的缓冲区进行分配，如果一个不可用的现有缓冲区。Renting a buffer from a shared class using the method will result in an existing buffer being taken from the pool if an appropriate buffer is available or in a new buffer being allocated if one is not available.
